subject: Soccer
Women
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Angela Hucles scored the game’s only goal in second-half injury time as the United States women’s national team defeated Canada, 1-0, to win the Peace Queen Cup on Saturday.
snippet: Angela Hucles scored the game’s only goal in second-half injury time as the United States women’s national team defeated Canada, 1-0, to win the Peace Queen Cup on Saturday.
